mfl2R 0.1.0
  • Reference

    MFL Endpoint

    mfl_endpoint.Rd

    R6 Class representing the the endpoint for MFL. Used for low level operations such as logging in and generating request urls.

    Methods

    Public methods

    • mfl_endpoint$new()

    • mfl_endpoint$print()

    • mfl_endpoint$login()

    • mfl_endpoint$logout()

    • mfl_endpoint$export_query()

    • mfl_endpoint$import_query()

    • mfl_endpoint$request()

    • mfl_endpoint$export_url()

    • mfl_endpoint$import_url()

    • mfl_endpoint$logged_in()

    • mfl_endpoint$clone()

    Method new()

    Usage

    mfl_endpoint$new(
  scheme = "https",
  host = "api.myfantasyleague.com",
  season = current_season
)

    Method print()

    Usage

    mfl_endpoint$print()

    Usage

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    mfl_endpoint$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
